column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message creation date/time not in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message Owner ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least one report must be present in the message.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report type must be present for new reports or corrections.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report type has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: SchemeID not provided for Related report ID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Related report ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Acceptance date/time not in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing activity TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Message ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The identification must exist for a FLUXFAQueryMessage

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Message ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message Owner ID not consistent with FLUX TL envelope parameters.

column.name: expression
column.value: purposeCode != null && (purposeCode.value == "1" || purposeCode.value == "3" || purposeCode.value == "5") && (referencedID == null || (referencedID != null && isEmpty(referencedID.value)))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Report ID missing. PurposeCode = 1, 3 or 5.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report creation date/time not in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Acceptance date/time not before report creation date/time.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report Owner ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Role of the related vessel missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid schemeID for country of registration.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid value for country of registration.

column.name: expression
column.value: !isEmpty(ids) && registrationVesselCountryId != null && ((mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("MEMBER_STATE", registrationVesselCountryId.value, creationDateOfMessage) && !containsAtLeastOneCorrectIdOfTheRequired("CFR")) || (!mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("MEMBER_STATE", registrationVesselCountryId.value, creationDateOfMessage) && (!containsAtLeastOneCorrectIdOfTheRequired("IRCS") || !containsAtLeastOneCorrectIdOfTheRequired("EXT_MARK"))))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid value for country of registration.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Report ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Report ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report Owner ID not consistent with FLUX TL envelope parameters.

column.name: expression
column.value: registrationVesselCountryId != null && transportMeans != null && (transportMeans.asset == null || (transportMeans.asset != null && isEmpty(transportMeans.asset.countryCode)) || transportMeans.asset.countryCode != registrationVesselCountryId.value)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Inconsistent information of vessel ID and registration country.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel ID CFR is provided but the vessel is not registered in EU.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel ID ICCAT is provided but the vessel is not registered in the ICCAT register.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel ID IRCS and external marking are provided, but the vessel is not registered on a list non-EU vessels.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact details of the reporting vessel are missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact details are missing for the pair fishing partner.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact RoleCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact RoleCode has an invalid value.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact alias missing as either given or family name are missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The contact alias cannot be empty.

column.name: expression
column.value: countryID != null && countryID.value != null && countryID.value != "IRL" && postalArea == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Postal area provided cannot be empty.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: City name provided cannot be empty.

column.name: expression
column.value: countryID != null && countryID.schemeId != null && countryID.value != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList(countryID.schemeId, countryID.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Given name of the contact missing as no contact alias is provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing activity TypeCode value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid fishing activity TypeCode for this sub-activity.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid occurrence date/time of the activity.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The activity or the sub-activity must have an occurrence date/time or a delimited period.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The activity or sub-activity must have a location.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Target species code has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel activity has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Sub-activity information not allowed for this type of activity.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Characteristics TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing gear TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("GEAR_TYPE", typeCode.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing gear RoleCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing gear role codes do not exist in list.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: GearCharacteristic TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Gear problem TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of gear problem TypeCode is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Recovery measure has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location for the gear problem is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid type of location provided for this gear problem.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: TypeCode for this catch is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: TypeCode for this catch has an invalid listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.listId != null && typeCode.value != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList(typeCode.listId, typeCode.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Species code has an invalid listID

column.name: expression
column.value: speciesCode != null && speciesCode.listId != null && speciesCode.value != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList(speciesCode.listId, speciesCode.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be present if neither live weight nor product weight are present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be a positive integer.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Unit of weight for this catch must be expressed in kilograms.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Size Distribution in AAPProduct must be present.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_GEAR_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "BOOLEAN" && valueIndicator == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FA_Catch Weighing_MeansCode attribute listID must be WEIGHT_MEANS.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FA_Catch Weighing_MeansCode code must be present in MDR codelist WEIGHT_MEANS.

column.name: expression
column.value: !((subActivity && fishingActivityTypeCode != null && fishingActivityTypeCode.value == "RELOCATION") || (!subActivity && fishingActivityTypeCode != null && (fishingActivityTypeCode.value == "AREA_ENTRY" || fishingActivityTypeCode.value == "AREA_EXIT"))) && isEmpty(sizeDistributionClassCode)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The ClassCode listID is not valid for this size distribution.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The size distribution ClassCode value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Specified Size_Distribution CategoryCode attribute listID must be FA_BFT_SIZE_CATEGORY

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Specified Size_Distribution CategoryCode value must be present in FA_BFT_SIZE_CATEGORY list

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be provided for Swordfish in GFCM. This rule only applies to catches related to the main fishing activity, not the related fishing activity.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Packaging TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of packaging TypeCode is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The average packaging unit weight must be expressed in kilograms.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The product weight must be expressed in kilograms.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FLUX Location in AAPProduct must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The average packaging unit weight must be a positive number.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Not more than 2 decimals should be provided for the weight of this catch.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be provided for landings/transhipments of Salmon from the Baltic sea.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be provided for landings/transhipments of Bluefin tuna from GFCM area.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check format. Must be according to schemeID rules. For schemeID=EU_TRIP_ID: Starting with the ISO-3 code of the country, followed by a hyphen, followed by TRP, followed by a hyphen, followed by a unique string of at most 20 alphanumeric characters. The string can be formatted according to the following pattern [A- Za-z0-9-\/]{0,20} For other schemeIDs => ignore

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Trip TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Trip ID TypeCode value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location CountryID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: expression
column.value: id != null && id.schemeId != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList(id.schemeId, id.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Class in SizeDistribution must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be positive integer number.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value != null && typeCode.value == "ADDRESS" && physicalStructuredAddress == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FLUX characteristic has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of the FLUX characteristic TypeCode is invalid.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "CODE" && (valueCode == null || valueCode != null && isEmpty(valueCode.value))

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "QUANTITY" && (valueQuantity == null || valueQuantity.value == null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel storage characteristics TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of vessel storage characteristics TypeCode is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If the activity is a departure declaration at least one RelatedFLUX Location/TypeCode must be LOCATION or POSITION

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location TypeCode value may only appear once.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: TypeCode of the catches is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The listID for the reason for departure is not valid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: More than one departure was found for this trip.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location for this area entry is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location TypeCode for this area entry is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel Activity code missing for this fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Number of operations is missing for this fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location for this fishing operation is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location for this fishing operation is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid sub-activity type for this fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: SpecifiedStructuredAddress must be present if used in entity FishingActivity/RelatedVesselTransportMeans and RelatedVesselTransportMeans/RoleCode is PAIR_FISHING_PARTNER.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location is missing for this joint fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least one location with TypeCode POSITION must be provided for this joint fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Only sub-activities with TypeCode RELOCATION may be provided for this joint fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel information of the related vessel(s) is missing for this joint fishing operation.

column.value: The RoleCode of the related vessel is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Catch details missing for this joint fishing operation.

column.value: Catch TypeCode for the related activity has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Catch TypeCode for the related activity is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing Activity ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The listID for the reason for entry is not valid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel information of the related vessel(s) is missing for thisrelocation operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid RoleCode for the related vessel.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid RoleCode for the related vessel.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Destination location of the BFT catches missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The schemeID of the destination location ID or the ID value is invalid.

column.value: FRelated report ID of the JFO catches is missing.

column.name: failure_message

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Catch TypeCode values LOADED or UNLOADED missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The RoleCode of the related vessel is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid schemeID or value for the RoleCode of the related vessel.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location of the discard is missing.

column.name: expression
column.value: (reasonCode != null && reasonCode.value != null && reasonCode.listId != null) && (reasonCode.listId != "FA_REASON_DISCARD" || reasonCode.value == "QEX" || reasonCode.value == "OTH")

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The ReasonCode value must be from the code list FA_REASON_DISCARD but may not be QEX or OTH.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: SpecifiedFA_ Catch TypeCode Must have at least one occurrence with Type ONBOARD.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Start date of the trip must be provided for a noticication of arrival.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If the activity is an arrival notification check presence of SpecifiedFLUXCharacteristic/TypeCode It must be present and equal to START_DATETIME_LANDING if ReasonCode is LAN (landing). ValueDateTime must be date/time in UTC according to ISO8601 and format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ (optional milliseconds).

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FLUX characteristic has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least the port of arrival (location) must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid RoleCode for the gear provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location where the catches are taken must be specified.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The area where the catches were taken must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The catches being loaded or unloaded in this operation are missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least a port or position must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Information concerning the other vessel involved in the transhipment is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid RoleCode for the related vessel.

column.value: Invalid RoleCode for the related vessel.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The location where the catches have been taken is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Area where the catches were taken must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence.Must be present if the activity is a transhipment declaration and SpecifiedFACatch/TypeCode = UNLOADED.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Destination location (port) of the receiving vessel must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The catches being loaded or unloaded in this operation are missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The location of the operation is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least a port (location) or position must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Information concerning the other vessel involved in the operation is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid RoleCode for the related vessel.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Category in SizeDistribution must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid RoleCode for the related vessel.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The area where the catches were taken must be provided.

column.name: expression
column.value: id != null && id.schemeId != null && mdrService.validateFormat(id, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Date/time of submission of the query must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The date/time of submission if the query must be a valid UTC date and in the correct format.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Submitter ID has an invalid schemeID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Submitter ID is not consistent with FLUX TL envelope parameters.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: A delimited period must be provided for this type of query.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Start date/time must be a valid UTC date in the correct format.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: End date/time must be a valid UTC date in the correct format.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least 2 query parameters must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Exactly one occurrence must be value CONSOLIDATED.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The date/time of sumission if the query must be in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Not more than one VESSELID may be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Query parameter TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of the query parameter TypeCode is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Must be value VESSELID if FAQuery/TypeCode is VESSEL or must be value TRIPID if FAQuery/TypeCode is TRIP

column.name: expression
column.value: valueID != null && typeCode != null && typeCode.value == "VESSELID" && !mdrService.isAllSchemeIdsPresentInMDRList("FLUX_VESSEL_ID_TYPE", Arrays.asList(valueID), creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response message ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response message ID value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The identification of the FLUX response Document must be unique and not already exist

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response referenced ID has invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response referenced ID value is invalid.

column.name: expression
column.value: messageType == "PULL" && referencedID != null && (getValueForSchemeId("FA_QUERY_ID", idsExistinigInTheDb) == null) && (getValueForSchemeId("FA_MESSAGE_ID", idsExistinigInTheDb) == null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The identification must exist for a FLUXFAReportMessage or for a FLUXFAQuery message.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response creation date/time must be a valid UTC date and in the correct.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response creation date/time must be in the past.

column.name: expression
column.value: responseCode != null && responseCode.value != null && responseCode.value != "OK" && isEmpty(relatedValidationResultDocuments)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Respondent ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Respondent ID is not consistent with FLUX TL envelope parameters.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Validator ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Quality analysis ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Quality analysis ID value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: RFMO code has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The listID for this processing type invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of the processing type is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be provided for Salmon in the Baltic sea

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Type in Fishing Activity must be present.

column.name: expression
column.value: isEmpty(resultAAPProduct) && ((codeTypeValueEquals(fishingActivityTypeCode, "LANDING") || codeTypeValueEquals(fishingActivityTypeCode, "TRANSHIPMENT")) && (codeTypeValueEquals(typeCode, "UNLOADED") || codeTypeValueEquals(typeCode, "LOADED")) || ((unitQuantity == null || unitQuantity.value == null) && (weightMeasure == null || weightMeasure.value == null)))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Information about product details is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be provided for Bluefin tuna in GFCM

column.name: expression
column.value: speciesCode != null && fishingActivityTypeCode != null && isEmpty(resultAAPProductUnitQuantity) && (fishingActivityTypeCode.value == "LANDING" || fishingActivityTypeCode.value == "TRANSHIPMENT") && speciesCode.value != null && speciesCode.value == "SWO" && !schemeIdContainsAny(faCatchFluxLocationId, "GFCM_GSA")

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Units (number of fish) must be provided for landings/transhipments of Swordfish from GFCM area.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The FLUX Characteristic TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "MEASURE" && valueMeasure != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_UNIT", valueMeasure.unitCode, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Identification of the destination vessel storage must be present and must have a valid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FLUXParty in FLUXReportDocument must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Item Type in SalesReport must be present.

column.name: failure_message

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Freshness in AAPProcess in AAPProduct must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Name in FLUX Organization must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Sales Currency in SalesDocument must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Sales Event in SalesDocument must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Sales Party in SalesDocument must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing Activity in SalesDocument must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Flux Location in SalesDocument must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Sales Batch in SalesDocument must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Role in SalesParty must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Name in SalesParty must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Species in AAPProduct must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Usage in AAPProduct must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: AAP Process in AAPProduct must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Delimited Period in Fishing Activity must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel Transport Means in Fishing Activity must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FLUX Location in Fishing Activity must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Start in Delimited Period must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Identification in Vessel Transport Means must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact Party in Vessel Transport Means must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Identification in Vessel Country must be present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Master or operator role in Contact Party must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: TypeCode in FLUX Location must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: LatitudeMeasure in FLUXGeographicalCoordinate must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: LongitudeMeasure in FLUXGeographicalCoordinate must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: CityName in StructuredAddress must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Country in StructuredAddress must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: StreetName in StructuredAddress must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Total price must be the total of product price

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be UUID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Format. Must be according to the specified schemeID.

column.name: expression
column.value: (creationDateTime == null || creationDateTime.dateTime == null) || creationDateTime != null && creationDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(creationDateTime)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Format. Must be date in UTC according to ISO8601

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Date must be in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_PURPOSE

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Code for cancellation is not allowed

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_PARTY

column.name: expression
column.value: !isAuction() && (isReport() && IDS != null && IDS.get(0) != null && IDS.get(0).getValue() != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_GP_PARTY", IDS.get(0).getValue(), creationDateOfMessage))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check format of the part corresponding to the national number

column.name: failure_message
column.value: check format of the common part

column.name: expression
column.value: ID != null && ID.getSchemeId() != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_SALES_PARTY_ID_TYPE", ID.getSchemeId(), creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: expression
column.value: (occurrenceDateTime == null || occurrenceDateTime.dateTime == null) || occurrenceDateTime != null && occurrenceDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(occurrenceDateTime)

column.name: expression
column.value: speciesCode != null && speciesCode.getValue() != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FAO_SPECIES", speciesCode.getValue(), creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check unit code: must be KGM

column.name: expression
column.value: weightMeasure != null && speciesCode != null && speciesCode.value != null && !speciesCode.value.equals("BFT") && getNumberOfDecimalPlaces(weightMeasure.value) > 2

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code from the list listID

column.name: expression
column.value: endDateTime != null && (endDateTime.dateTime == null || endDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(endDateTime))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be EU_TRIP_ID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check format. Must be according to schemeID rules

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_LOCATION_TYPE

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be TERRITORY

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute listID. In case Type= 'AREA': must be FAO_AREA, TERRITORY, In case Type= 'LOCATION': must be LOCATION, FARM

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If FAO_AREA code, the more precise area must be mentioned

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: expression
column.value: latitudeMeasure != null && latitudeMeasure.getValue() != null && !isBigDecimalBetween(latitudeMeasure.getValue(), BigDecimal.valueOf(-90), BigDecimal.valueOf(90))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check range. Must be between -90 and 90

column.name: expression
column.value: longitudeMeasure != null && longitudeMeasure.getValue() != null && !isBigDecimalBetween(longitudeMeasure.getValue(), BigDecimal.valueOf(-180), BigDecimal.valueOf(180))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check range. Must be between -180 and 180

column.name: expression
column.value: FLUXReportDocument != null && FLUXReportDocument.getPurposeCode() != null && FLUXReportDocument.getPurposeCode().getValue() != "3" && (salesReports == null || salesReports.size() != 1)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: One and only one occurrence of a sales report if purpose is not 'delete'

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If correction or deletion, the referenced identification must be provided and it must be the one of a an existing Sales Report message

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence of attribute listID. Must be present and have a value of an existing code list in MDR.

column.name: expression
column.value: purposeCode != null && purposeCode.getValue().equals("9") && referencedID != null && referencedID.value != null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If it is a new message (creation), the referenced identification must be empty

column.name: failure_message
column.value: PROVIDER role must exist for a SN

column.name: failure_message
column.value: SELLER/BUYER role must exist for a SN when products are bought (not withdrawn)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: RECIPIENT role must exist for a Take-over doc

column.name: failure_message
column.value: For a take-over doc, if the usage code equals 'STO' (Storage), the SN identifier should be communicated

column.name: expression
column.value: (unitQuantity == null && weightMeasure == null) || (unitQuantity != null && weightMeasure != null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: One of the two must be available

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Usage must be for non direct human consumption if BMS species

column.name: failure_message
column.value: It must not be a LOCATION code for AAP products

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Only one FAO_AREA code per product

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If BMS species, the category should be N/A

column.name: failure_message
column.value: It must be a LOCATION code for the landing

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least one occurrence and maximum two

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Codes other than master/operator are not allowed

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Must be present for each party

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if AliasText is not present.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if AliasText is not present.

column.name: expression
column.value: alias == null && givenName == null && familyName == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if GivenNameText or FamilyNameText is not.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if Type is LOCATION or ADDRESS.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present, unless type is 'POSITION' or 'ADDRESS'

column.name: expression
column.value: ID != null && ID.getSchemeId() != null && "LOCATION".equals(ID.getSchemeId()) && (isBlank(countryID) || mdrService.isLocationNotInCountry(ID, countryID, creationDateOfMessage))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If LOCATION code, the place must be in the country

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if Type=POSITION.

column.name: expression
column.value: ID == null && physicalStructuredAddress == null && (specifiedPhysicalFLUXGeographicalCoordinate == null || specifiedPhysicalFLUXGeographicalCoordinate.getLongitudeMeasure() == null || specifiedPhysicalFLUXGeographicalCoordinate.getLatitudeMeasure() == null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Latitude & longitude must be provided if there is no identification and no address

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if location Type is ADDRESS.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least one value must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Must be present if validation document

column.name: expression
column.value: (submittedDateTime == null || submittedDateTime.dateTime == null) || submittedDateTime != null && submittedDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(submittedDateTime)

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && IDS != null && !IDS.isEmpty() && IDS.get(0) != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_GP_PARTY", IDS.get(0).getValue(), creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && ((startDateTime == null || startDateTime.dateTime == null) || (startDateTime != null && startDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(startDateTime)))

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && ((endDateTime == null || endDateTime.dateTime == null) || (endDateTime != null && endDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(endDateTime)))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If Type = FLAG/ROLE/PLACE, Check code of the value

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.getValue() == "VESSEL" && !(valueID == null || isEmpty(valueID.getValue()) || isIdTypeValidFormat("CFR", valueID))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If Type=VESSEL, Check format of CFR

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If Type = SALES_ID or TRIP_ID: Check format of the part corresponding to the national number

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If Type = SALES_ID or TRIP_ID: Check format of the common part

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be UUID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Format. Must be according to the specified schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be in the FLUX_GP_MSG_ID list

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Format. Must be according to the specified schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_RESPONSE

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check value. Code must be value of the specified code list in listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: (creationDateTime == null || creationDateTime.dateTime == null) || creationDateTime != null && creationDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(creationDateTime)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Format. Must be date in UTC according to ISO8601

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute listID. Must be FLUX_GP_PARTY

column.name: expression
column.value: (creationDateTime == null || creationDateTime.dateTime == null) || creationDateTime != null && creationDateTime.dateTime != null && isNotUTC(creationDateTime)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check value. Code must be value of the specified code list in listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Code. Must be in the list specified in listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Code. Must be in the list specified in listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Type=ROLE, values FLAG or LAND only for MS INT for international organization

column.name: expression
column.value: isQuery() && startDateTime != null && endDateTime != null && startDateTime.getDateTime() != null && endDateTime.getDateTime() != null && startDateTime.getDateTime().getMillis() > endDateTime.getDateTime().getMillis()

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Must be present if ResponseCode != OK

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least one occurrence if not link with the Sales Report

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The Creation must be < to the Creation of the report

column.name: failure_message
column.value: In case of a correction, the item type must be the same as the item type of the referenced report

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The identification must be unique and not already exist

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check if OwnerFLUXParty.ID is consistent with FLUX TL values.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: It must be an official currency of the country at that date

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If SENDER role, it should be a MS Identification

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The reception date (by Market state) should not be later than 24h after the sale date

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The reception date (by the Take-Over state) should not be later than 24h after the landing declaration date

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If CFR, the vessel should be in the EU fleet under the flag state at landing date

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The identification must be unique and not already exist

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Must be a reference of a query or sales declaration

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Date must be in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check if RespondentFLUXParty.ID is consistent with FLUX TL values.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: ID of Sales Party must start with RB- when the party is a sender

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The name of the class 'FLUX_Party' must never be filled in

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The BEL:SALE class cannot be deleted

column.name: failure_message
column.value: BEL:SALECountry: code should exist in MDR

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID. Must be UUID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check Format. Must be according to the specified schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Trip ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: ID of the related vessel is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Catch TypeCode must be present for this joint fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Destination location of the BFT catches missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Affected quantity must be a positive integer.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The number of packages must be a positive integer number.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if species is BFT with weight > 0 (kg). The rule does not apply neither to relocation sub-activity nor to an area entry or exit (as main activity) where WeighingMeansCode is not mandatory to be reported for the catches.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The product weight must be a positive number.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of the conversion factor must be a positive number.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If the value of TypeCode is NB_CAGES_TOWED the value must be a positive integer number.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing License, Authorization or Permit ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing License, Authorization or Permit ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing License, Authorization or Permit ID is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Destination vessel storage information is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if the activity is a relocation or transhipment declaration and SpecifiedFACatch/SpeciesCode = BFT

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && (mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "NUMBER" || mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "MEASURE") && valueMeasure == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If UN_DATA_TYPE for the characteristic (specified in FLUXCharacteristic/TypeCode) is MEASURE or NUMBER, ValueMeasure must be present and have a value

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value !=null && (mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_GEAR_CHARACTERISTIC" , typeCode.value) == "NUMBER" || mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_GEAR_CHARACTERISTIC" , typeCode.value) == "MEASURE") && valueMeasure == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If UN_DATA_TYPE for the characteristic (specified in FLUXCharacteristic/TypeCode) is MEASURE or NUMBER, ValueMeasure must be present and have a value

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "BOOLEAN" && (valueIndicator == null || valueIndicator.isIndicator() == null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If UN_DATA_TYPE23 for the characteristic (specified in FLUXCharacteristic/TypeCode) is BOOLEAN, ValueIndicator must be present and have a value.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least presentation (and for landing and transhipment as well preservation) of the fish must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence. Must be present if FishingActivity/TypeCode is not equal to not LANDING nor TRANSHIPMENT declaration.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Family name of the contact missing as no contact alias is provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: StartDateTime must be present if FishingActivity/TypeCode is LANDING or TRANSHIPMENT declaration

column.name: expression
column.value: (typeCode != null && id != null) && ((typeCode.value == "AREA" && id.schemeId != "FAO_AREA" && id.schemeId != "STAT_RECTANGLE" && id.schemeId != "MANAGEMENT_AREA" && id.schemeId != "TERRITORY" && id.schemeId != "EFFORT_ZONE" && id.schemeId != "GFCM_GSA" && id.schemeId != "STAT_RECTANGLE" && id.schemeId != "GFCM_STAT_RECTANGLE") || (typeCode.value == "LOCATION" && id.schemeId != "LOCATION" && id.schemeId != "FARM"))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check attribute schemeID of ID. In case TypeCode= AREA the schemeID must be FAO_AREA, STAT_RECTANGLE, TERRITORY, EFFORT_ZONE, GFCM_GSA, MANAGEMENT_AREA. In case TypeCode= LOCATION: the schemeID must be LOCATION or FARM

column.name: expression
column.value: "PULL".equals(messageType) && (referencedID != null || (purposeCode != null && (purposeCode.value == "1" || purposeCode.value == "5" || purposeCode.value == "3"))) && referencedID != null && referencedID.schemeId == "UUID" && !mdrService.validateFormat(referencedID, creationDateOfMessage) && !containsAny(nonUniqueIdsList, Arrays.asList(referencedID))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Report ID does not refer to an acknowledged Report ID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: EndDateTime must be present if FishingActivity/TypeCode is LANDING or TRANSHIPMENT declaration

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && (typeCode.value == "FISHING_OPERATION" || typeCode.value == "JOINT_FISHING_OPERATION" || typeCode.value == "GEAR_SHOT" || typeCode.value == "GEAR_RETRIEVAL" || typeCode.value == "DISCARD" || typeCode.value == "RELOCATION" ) && isEmpty(relatedFluxLocationRFMOCodeList) && !rfmoProvided(relatedFLUXLocations)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: There can only be one arrival declaration in the trip.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Identification in FishingTrip must be present

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check value. If the activity is a joint fishing operation declaration, there cannot be more than one occurrence of VesselTransportMeans/RoleCode = 'CATCHING_VESSEL' for the Related- and SpecifiedVesselTransportMeans entities in this FAReportDocument.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Must be present if no conversion factor available for combination of FISH_PRESENTATION, FISH_PRESERVATION, Species and if applicable Area

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check value. Must be existing on the MDR code list specified in listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If the activity is a fishing operation declaration and the RelatedFishingActivity/TypeCode is either GEAR_SHOT or GEAR_RETRIEVAL, then the RelatedFishingActivity shall not contain SpecifiedFACatch entities.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence of attribute listID. Must be present and have a value of an existing code list in MDR.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check value. Must be existing on the MDR code list specified in listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If more than one AppliedAAPProcess is present for one FACatch, there must be at least one occurrence where CF > 1 which means : a) there must be at least one occurrence where ConversionFactorNumeric > 1 or b) a conversion factor exists in the CONVERSION_FACTOR code list (MDR) for the combination of parameters and has a value > 1.
